org.jpc.util

Class PrologUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpc.util.PrologUtil

  • public class PrologUtil
extends Object
    An utility class for general purpose queries and term manipulation Disclaimer: Some methods were inspired or adapted from the JPL library
    Author:
    scastro
